thread.title: Johnny Hekker made a list of why Kayvon Webster should sign with Rams
thread.title_full: Johnny Hekker made a list of why Kayvon Webster should sign with Rams

title: Johnny Hekker made a list of why Kayvon Webster should sign with Rams
text:
Johnny Hekker made a list of why Kayvon Webster should sign with Rams Johnny Hekker made a list of why Kayvon Webster should sign with Rams By Bryan Kalbrosky 6 hours ago 466 shares By: Bryan Kalbrosky | 6 hours ago 
Denver Broncos free agent cornerback Kayvon Webster now has a list of reasons to sign with the Los Angeles Rams thanks to Johnny Hekker. 
Webster had announced on Sunday afternoon that he planned to arrive in Los Angeles to visit with the Rams. Visit uno tomorrow ! Rams ? ü§îüò´üòÜüòè pic.twitter.com/kROKujKyJ0 
Later that night, Hekker told Rams fans to show Webster some love. Then, this is what Hekker tweeted on Sunday night: 
‚ÄúGreat things about LA -the weather (went to the beach Christmas Day) -the food -the chance to play under Wade Phillips Boom!!‚Äù 
It would make sense for the Rams to have expressed interest in Webster. They‚Äôre thin at cornerback and he played under Phillips in Denver last season. 
Webster was also captain of the special teams unit for the Broncos so it would make sense as to why Hekker would want him in Los Angeles. @kayvonwebster @sonofbum Gonna sell ketchup popsicles to people in white gloves. Haha enjoy the visit man. 
‚Äî Johnny Hekker (@JHekker) March 13, 2017 
The free agent noticed the pitch from Hekker and told him that he should be a ‚Äúsalesman‚Äù when he retires from being an NFL punter. 
Hekker, in response, wished Webster well and told him about obscure plans for what he plans to sell ‚Äî which seems to be a more difficult pitch than the Rams. Related:
